column4: ok, restarting ubuntu has made my newly created launcher appear on the desktop. how do i move it into a menu on the application bar? using hoary by the way...
no direct way
so any newly created launchers will have to stay on the desktop for now?
is there a way?
sure is :)
thanks
in a terminal type sudo nano /etc/modules
add it to your /etc/modules
how? what do i have to enter to do this?
ok thanks. what does the nano bit do?
ok thanks i have done that using gedit but don't know where i add the modules and whether they should be commented or uncommented?
just list the modules name
no been on here a few times but no one was able to help...
guise it is the luck of who is online at the time
guess even!
go to a terminal and do a sudo slocate -u
doing that...
ok it has finished doing whatever it was doing. now what?
so that message i recevied ahould have disappeared, right?
just to be sure, in the terminal type sudo -s, to do a cd /var/lib/slocate and see if slocate.db is there
sorry, disappeared, due to responsibilities for a certain 2 year old! was going to ask you what the message i received referred too?
ok, thanks
do i need to run the command that was reported as being run as a cron job? i.e., test -e /usr/sbin/anacron || run-parts --report /etc/cron.daily
